reviews.review: Buen , juego muy divertido y entretenido.

good game with good puzzles

Смысла писать обзор на Portal 2 нет никакого. И так всё всем понятно!
Написал вот это только для еще одного + к рекомендациям.

Having been one of the first games I've ever purchased as a child, even pre-ordering it to play with a friend of mine, this game still amazes me and holds up extremely well. The gameplay is satisfying, solving a complex puzzle is highly rewarding, and so many test maps available on the community hub you'll never run out of puzzles to solve.

Still worth purchasing in 2019, and for many years beyond.
very good. still holds up to its reviews
Both the single and multiplayer are must have experiences for any gamer that enjoys puzzles.  Especially when it goes on sale for a buck or two.
An amazing game. It can provide dozens and even hundreds of hours of entertainment, even without custom levels.
Fun to play with other people :)

Первая часть была отличной мне особенно понравился сюжет, так во второй он продолжился и он мне очень понравился более того графика и уровни стали сложнее за это огромный плюс игре. В целом игру рекомендую всем поиграть желательно начинать с первой части.

Absolutely fantastic first person puzzle game, it's a great sequel and honestly surpasses the original game in some ways. I really enjoyed it, and the addition of a co-op mode makes the game even better! Definitely would recommend this to anyone who enjoys puzzle games!
Хорошая и интересная игра, потраченные на нее часы не пройдут зря :)
Ótimo jogo pra jogar com seu amigo burro !

Очень хорошая игра, не смотря на свой "возраст"

jogo interessante pra quem quer um desafio. ele contém varios puzzles

A pretty funny game; extremely fun and involves cake and potatoes, what more could you want?
Still awesome game with great gameplay and humor
es muy bueno la historia, soundtrack y hay mas niveles que el primero aunque me falta probar otros modos de juego como desafio y co op pero siento que seran buenos XD

I really, really, really love this game. Ive played it since it came out, first on the PS3, and now Ive transitioned to playing on the pc and I cant reccomend this game enough. It plays smoothly, challenging puzzles and wonderful humor, great characters and just. im trying not to smell my own farts, or valves, but to me -- its good. I love this game! its great, and Id love for more people to play it and experience it themselves. the gameplay is semi long, but it really depends on how you solve and work through the puzzles, and even now I sometimes still get stuck on the puzzles despite playing it through at LEAST 10 times. still looks good despite its age graphic wise too, due to stylization and things of the like.

Coop: Prank your "friends" simulator
Really fun and challenging. Best with friends tho
One of the best games ever,you all know what its about so i wont go into details but lots of laughs if you dont already have it get it:)

Отличная головоломка со своим, более продвинутым сюжетом. Так же порадовала возможность поиграть по сети с другом. И карты специальные под это есть, и комментарии Глэдос под наши действия тоже кошерны! Жду продолжения игры, Гейб!

O jogo é interessante e tem uma história muito boa, porém a gameplay é um pouco cansativa e não muda muito ao avançar nas fases, vale a pena jogar pela história, não tem legendas em português. Daria uma nota de 5/10.
